title: Helix Hub Impact Accelerator
description: over 42% of early stage ventures identify "the lack of a market need for their product" as the single biggest reason for failure
solution: Deploy UK's leading accelerator programme to help inexperienced entrepreneurial teams translate their ideas into funded sustainable ventures
experience: Queen's University - 1st in the UK as the most entrepreneurial university 2020 delivering the InnovateUK ICURe in partnership with HelixHub
